oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Stars For Defense program - Eddy Arnold - 1958-03-07
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Transcription of the Stars For Defense radio program recorded on March 7, 1958 with featured guest Eddy Arnold and with narration by Jay Jackson and musical accompaniment by Ray Bloch and His Orchestra.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ray Bloch and His Orchestra; Eddy Arnold; Jay Jackson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Eddy Arnold announces the opening statements / (0:16) Ray Bloch and His Orchestra perform the opening theme / (0:26) Jay Jackson introduces Eddy Arnold / (1:00) Eddy Arnold performs "Wagon Wheels" / (2:54) Jay Jackson and Eddy Arnold talk about the next performance / (3:17) Eddy Arnold performs "You've Made Up For Everything," written by Cindy Walker / (6:09) Jay Jackson and Eddy Arnold announce information regarding the United States Defense program, NORAD / (8:41) Ray Bloch and His Orchestra perform "Blue Room," written by Richard Rodgers / (11:21) Jay Jackson and Eddy Arnold introduces the next performance / (11:33) Eddy Arnold performs "When He Was Young," written by Fred Ebb and Eddy Manson / (13:40) Ray Bloch and His Orchestra perform the closing theme and Jay Jackson announces the closing statements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; Bloch, Ray; Jackson, Jay
